p: CPS (~5 mg) was dissolved in 1 mL of 99% D 2O to replace all exchangeable protons, freeze-dried, and dissolved in 0.75 mL of 99.9% D 2O for measurements. The 1H NMR spectrum was recorded at 40 °C using a Bruker Avance III 500 MHz spectrometer. 1H chemical shifts were referenced to acetone (δH 2.225).
